 Crime<BR>> recording <BR>> process, where I get leads from deceased victims and hand<BR>> over to law <BR>> enforcement or missing person advocates to run the leads.<BR>> <BR>> <A href="http://uk.youtube.com/watch?v=WhGKXBp6Lg0" target=_blank rel=nofollow>http://uk.youtube. com/watch? v=WhGKXBp6Lg0</A><BR>> <BR>> I went out to Mike Colletta's site to see if there was<BR>> any guidance, <BR>> but none on how to sync up my voice in the video.<BR>> <BR>> I used a web cam to do the recording.<BR>> <BR>> Does anyone know how to do this?<BR>> <BR>> Mike Edwards<BR><BR></DIV></DIV></DIV></BLOCKQUOTE></td></tr></table><br>
